title: ENSURE SECLI - SYSTEM DATE IS SET TO CURRENT CUTOVER DATE

task_list.instruction_title:
_**FOR SECLI**_

ChangeLinuxSystemDate job on control-M PRD-GVA-COM-DC with the following parameters:
To change without reboot SECLI's date

PARM1 : change
PARM2 : lxvgvasecev403s  AND lxvgvasecev303s
PARM3 : **2025.08.22**
PARM4 :
